News.headline: Sunday Football At The Daggers: 15th January
News.page_title: Sunday Football At The Daggers: 15th January
News.URL_keywords: Sunday Football At The Daggers: 15th January
News.short_description: Enjoy a packed Sunday of football at the Daggers Bar.
News.description:
Football Sundays will be back between 1:00-7:00pm on Sunday with two games from the Premier League being shown live on Sky Sports, with the two Merseyside teams taking on the two Manchester clubs. First Everton will host Manchester City at Goodison Park, before Manchester United take on Liverpool at Old Trafford.

Take advantage of the Football Sundays offers on selected drinks at £2.49, which include; Carling, Cask Ale, Bottle Coors, Carling English Cider and Koppaberg. 

These offers are open to members only. Season ticket holders are automatically members but anyone wishing to buy a membership on the day can do so by asking a member of bar staff. So make sure you buy your membership for just £2!
